alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; Northern Aitkin; South Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 11:46AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Itasca, northeastern Aitkin and southwestern St. Louis Counties through 1215 PM CDT... At 1146 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Warba, or 14 miles southeast of Grand Rapids, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Jacobson around 1150 AM CDT. Swan River and Warba around 1155 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central St. Louis; Northern Aitkin; South Itasca
